name: Write It! Arabic
description: Write It! Arabic is the first writing recognition app for the Arabic alphabet! Try our writing recognition and youll never want to go back to tracing apps.   Hassle-free writing. Never get stuck or have to go back and reference how to write a letter.   Practice writing the alphabet with guides before testing yourself, making learning letters extremely fast and stress-free.   Bite-sized lessons allow you to learn how to write the alphabet quickly, even if you only have a few minutes to spare.   Review the letters you have already learned in review mode.   Write the alphabet anywhere! No longer be restricted to writing only when you have paper and a pen!  Stop referencing books, watching videos, and using tracing apps that never test you, download Write It! Arabic now for the fastest way to learn the Arabic alphabet!
